headline: Performance Food Group Selects Trimble as Premier Fleet Management Provider
summary: Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) announced today that Performance Food Group Company (PFG) (NYSE:PFGC), one of North America's largest food and foodservice distribution companies, has selected Trimble, as its premier fleet management provider — servicing 100 percent of PFG's fleet business and doubling the number of trucks managed with Trimble in-cab technology from 4,000 to more than 8,000.

content.title: Performance Food Group Selects Trimble as Premier Fleet Management Provider
content.summary: Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) announced today that Performance Food Group Company (PFG) (NYSE:PFGC), one of North America's largest food and foodservice distribution companies, has selected Trimble, as its premier fleet management provider — servicing 100 percent of PFG's fleet business and doubling the number of trucks managed with Trimble in-cab technology from 4,000 to more than 8,000.

thumbnail.caption: Performance Food Group (PFG) migrates 100 percent of its fleet management business to Trimble Instinct, doubling Trimble-serviced trucks.
